---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

 -2^2 * 2^4 = -4*16 = -64 + 2^30 = 2147483584 = 


01010
R10 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 1 - 001
LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 3 - 011
LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 5 - 101 
LI R10 with 0100000000000000 at index 7 - 111

00101
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 1 - 001
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 5 - 101
LI R5 with 1111111111111100 at index 7 - 111

00001
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  1 - 001
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  3 - 011
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  5 - 101
LI R1 with 0000000000010000 at index  7 - 111
 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1000100001001010101000000


program:

0001010000000000000001010 
0011010000000000000001010 
0101010000000000000001010 
0111010000000000000001010
0001111111111111110000101 
0011111111111111110000101 
0101111111111111110000101 
0111111111111111110000101
0001000000000001000000001 
0011000000000001000000001 
0101000000000001000000001 
0111000000000001000000001
1000100001001010101000000






passes.

---------------------------------------------------
